title: Academic Menu
content: Access all academic resources and tools in one place, including course materials, grades, and schedules.

title: Notice Board Menu
content: Stay up to date with the latest news, announcements, and events through the Notice Board menu.

title: Leave Request Menu
content: Easily request time off and track the status of your leave requests through the Leave Request menu.

title: All Transaction Menu
content: Manage your finances effectively with the All Transaction menu. View and organize all of your transactions in one place.
